section.name: Release Description 1.3.0
section.p: This release of the Inventory Program Set is a component of the integrated release (1.3.0) of the HORIZON System. This release is intended as an operational release. The following sections can be found in this document:

section.name: Capabilities
section.p: This section details the new, modified and corrected capabilities that comprise this release of the Common-Crawler Program Set. In lieu of listing the capabilities by requirement they have been summarized.

subsection.name: New Capabilities
subsection.p: Generic Crawler was released for operational use.

subsection.name: Modified Capabilities
subsection.p: There were no corrected capabilities for this release

subsection.name: Corrected Capabilities
subsection.p: There were no corrected capabilities for this release.
